exams.name: Google AI Essentials Practice Test Practice
exams.description: A practice test to assess your knowledge for the Google AI Essentials Practice Test.

exams.name: Google AI Essentials Practice Test
exams.description: The Google AI Essentials Practice Test, hosted on the Annapoorna Infotech examination platform, is designed to help learners assess and strengthen their understanding of foundational AI concepts covered in the Google AI Essentials course. This beginner-friendly course, developed by Google AI experts, equips professionals with practical skills to use generative AI tools for everyday work tasks, requiring no prior coding experience. The practice test offered through Annapoorna Infotech serves as a preparation tool for the course’s certification, focusing on real-world AI applications and ethical considerations.

exams.name: Risk Adjustment Coding Skills Practice
exams.description: A practice test to assess your knowledge for the Risk Adjustment Coding Skills.

exams.name: Risk Adjustment Coding Skills
exams.description: Prepare for risk adjustment coding with this focused 100-question multiple-choice test series, emphasizing hierarchical condition categories (HCC) and risk adjustment models. Ideal for coders in value-based care settings, this series strengthens your ability to accurately capture patient risk profiles. Topics Covered: HCC coding, risk adjustment methodologies, ICD-10-CM, documentation requirements, and audit compliance. Upon successful completion, candidates earn a certificate titled “Risk Adjustment Coding Skills,” recognizing expertise in HCC and risk adjustment coding. This credential is valuable for roles in managed care and payer environments.

exams.name: Revenue Cycle Management Skills Practice
exams.description: A practice test to assess your knowledge for the Revenue Cycle Management Skills.

exams.name: Revenue Cycle Management Skills
exams.description: Validate your expertise in the end-to-end revenue cycle process with this comprehensive 100-question exam.

exams.name: Medical Terminology & Anatomy Skills Practice
exams.description: A practice test to assess your knowledge for the Medical Terminology & Anatomy Skills.

exams.name: Medical Terminology & Anatomy Skills
exams.description: A foundational exam to certify your understanding of the medical language and human body systems that are essential for accurate coding.

exams.name: Medical Coding Fundamentals Skills Practice
exams.description: A practice test to assess your knowledge for the Medical Coding Fundamentals Skills.

exams.name: Medical Coding Fundamentals Skills
exams.description: Establish your expertise in the core principles of medical coding with this foundational 100-question exam.

exams.name: Medical Billing Skills Assessment Practice
exams.description: A practice test to assess your knowledge for the Medical Billing Skills Assessment.

exams.name: Medical Billing Skills Assessment
exams.description: Validate your expertise in the entire medical billing process from patient registration and claim submission to payment posting and collections. Ideal for aspiring billing specialists.

exams.name: ICD-10-CM Coding Proficiency Practice
exams.description: A practice test to assess your knowledge for the ICD-10-CM Coding Proficiency.

exams.name: ICD-10-CM Coding Proficiency
exams.description: An in-depth assessment of your ability to accurately use the ICD-10-CM code set for diagnosis coding across various healthcare settings. Perfect for validating your specialized skills.

exams.name: Health Informatics Skills Assessment Practice
exams.description: A practice test to assess your knowledge for the Health Informatics Skills Assessment.

exams.name: Health Informatics Skills Assessment
exams.description: Demonstrate your knowledge in health data management, standards, and technology with this 120-question exam.

exams.name: Evaluation & Management Coding Skills Practice
exams.description: A practice test to assess your knowledge for the Evaluation & Management Coding Skills.

exams.name: Evaluation & Management Coding Skills
exams.description: Master the nuances of E/M coding with this 100-question exam focused on the latest guidelines and scenarios.

exams.name: Risk Adjustment Coding Proficiency Practice
exams.description: A practice test to assess your knowledge for the Risk Adjustment Coding Proficiency.

exams.name: Risk Adjustment Coding Proficiency
exams.description: This exam validates your expertise in risk adjustment (HCC) models. It tests your ability to link diagnoses to chronic conditions for accurate risk score calculation.

exams.name: Medical Auditing Skills Assessment Practice
exams.description: A practice test to assess your knowledge for the Medical Auditing Skills Assessment.

exams.name: Medical Auditing Skills Assessment
exams.description: Prepare for medical auditing proficiency with this 100-question multiple-choice test series, focusing on medical auditing and compliance. Ideal for coders and auditors, this series ensures thorough preparation for auditing roles. Topics Covered: Medical documentation, coding compliance, fraud and abuse detection, auditing principles, and regulatory guidelines. Upon successful completion, candidates receive a certificate titled “Medical Auditing Skills Assessment,” recognizing expertise in medical auditing. This credential is valuable for compliance and auditing careers.

exams.name: Physician Coding Proficiency Practice
exams.description: A practice test to assess your knowledge for the Physician Coding Proficiency.

exams.name: Physician Coding Proficiency
exams.description: This comprehensive exam tests your mastery of CPT HCPCS Level II and ICD-10-CM coding for physician services. Prove your readiness for the official AAPC CPC credential.

exams.name: Medical Billing Proficiency Practice
exams.description: A practice test to assess your knowledge for the Medical Billing Proficiency.

exams.name: Medical Billing Proficiency
exams.description: Get ready for medical billing proficiency with this 100-question multiple-choice test series, covering the full spectrum of the healthcare revenue cycle. Perfect for billing professionals, this series ensures comprehensive preparation. Topics Covered: Billing regulations, claims processing, reimbursement methods, compliance, and denial management. Upon successful completion, candidates receive a certificate titled “Medical Billing Proficiency,” recognizing proficiency in medical billing and revenue cycle management. This credential enhances your value in billing and practice management roles.

exams.name: Outpatient Coding Skills Assessment Practice
exams.description: A practice test to assess your knowledge for the Outpatient Coding Skills Assessment.

exams.name: Outpatient Coding Skills Assessment
exams.description: Test your knowledge of outpatient coding including CPT ICD-10-CM and HCPCS Level II as it applies to hospital outpatient departments and ambulatory surgery centers.

exams.name: Inpatient Coding Proficiency Practice
exams.description: A practice test to assess your knowledge for the Inpatient Coding Proficiency.

exams.name: Inpatient Coding Proficiency
exams.description: Prepare for inpatient coding proficiency with this 100-question multiple-choice test series, designed for hospital inpatient facility coding. Tailored for inpatient coders, this series ensures expertise in complex coding scenarios. Topics Covered: ICD-10-PCS, DRG assignment, inpatient coding guidelines, medical necessity, and compliance. Upon successful completion, candidates receive a certificate titled “Inpatient Coding Proficiency,” recognizing proficiency in inpatient coding. This credential is essential for hospital-based coding roles.

exams.name: Hospital Coding Skills Assessment Practice
exams.description: A practice test to assess your knowledge for the Hospital Coding Skills Assessment.

exams.name: Hospital Coding Skills Assessment
exams.description: Excel in hospital-based coding with this robust 100-question multiple-choice test series, focusing on advanced inpatient coding scenarios. Tailored for experienced coders, this series sharpens your skills in complex coding environments. Topics Covered: Inpatient diagnosis and procedure coding, DRG assignment, ICD-10-CM/PCS, medical necessity, and compliance. Upon successful completion, candidates receive a certificate titled “Hospital Coding Skills Assessment,” highlighting expertise in inpatient coding and reimbursement methodologies. This credential is ideal for hospital-based coding roles.

exams.name: Medical Coding Across Settings Proficiency Practice
exams.description: A practice test to assess your knowledge for the Medical Coding Across Settings Proficiency.

exams.name: Medical Coding Across Settings Proficiency
exams.description: Demonstrate your competency in coding patient data across all settings including hospitals and physician practices. A crucial step towards achieving your AHIMA CCA certification.

exams.name: Anatomy & Physiology Skills Assessment Practice
exams.description: A practice test to assess your knowledge for the Anatomy & Physiology Skills Assessment.

exams.name: Anatomy & Physiology Skills Assessment
exams.description: Validate your knowledge with this comprehensive 100-question multiple-choice test series, covering key concepts in Anatomy & Physiology essential for accurate medical coding. Perfect for aspiring coders, this exam ensures a strong foundation in human body systems. Topics Covered: Human anatomy, physiology, and clinical concepts critical for coding accuracy. Upon successful completion, candidates receive a certificate titled “Anatomy & Physiology Skills Assessment,” recognizing expertise in foundational healthcare knowledge. This credential supports career advancement in medical coding and related fields.

certificateTemplates.name: Default Practice Certificate
certificateTemplates.title: Certificate of Proficiency
certificateTemplates.body: This certifies that {candidateName} has successfully demonstrated proficiency in the {examName} practice exam, achieving a score of {finalScore}%.

certificateTemplates.name: Default Completion Certificate
certificateTemplates.title: Certificate of Achievement
certificateTemplates.body: This is to certify that {candidateName} has successfully completed the rigorous requirements of the {examName} and is hereby awarded this certificate upon achieving a passing score of {finalScore}%.
